overview: The king of Bossa Nova, Antonio Carlos Jobim, gives a glittering concert, shot in Los Angeles and featuring Jobim's brilliant ensemble of leading Brazilian musicians and singers. From the daring, benchmark sounds of `Desafinado' (partly responsible for launching the Bossa craze in the 1950's) to Jobim's most philosophical classic `Aguas de Mar√ßo' (Waters of March), the intricate yet always engaging and enveloping sound of Jobim's music makes this concert a standout.
title: Antonio Carlos Jobim In Concert
